area.content: Modules can add to the set of available features on your site, or change the way existing features work.
Themes are skins for your site that allow you to change the look, feel, and general appearance.
Layouts divide pages on your site into different columns or regions where content can be placed.

style_options.description: New modules, themes, and layouts, for Backdrop CMS.

created.label: Post date
created.custom_date_format: D, d M Y h:m:s O
